text: Wantagh is a hamlet and census-designated place (CDP) on Long Island, New York. In 2020, there were 18,613 people living there. Wantagh is known as "The Gateway to Jones Beach." The neighboring towns of Wantagh are Levittown, Seaford, Merrick, and Bellmore. Category:Census-designated places in New York (state) Category:Hamlets in New York (state)
title: Wantagh
